(:action cut ; Cut an item to obtain a derived item and update inventory status
  :parameters (?p - person ?item - object ?derived_item - object)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?item))
  :effect (and (inventory ?p ?derived_item) (not (inventory ?p ?item))

(:action slip ; Slip beads onto a strip
  :parameters (?p - player ?strip - strip ?bead1 - bead ?bead2 - bead ?small_bead - bead)
  :precondition (and (inventory ?p ?strip) (inventory ?p ?bead1) (inventory ?p ?small_bead)
                     (or (not (exists (?bead2 - bead) (inventory ?p ?bead2))) (inventory ?p ?bead2)))
  :effect (and (on_strip ?strip ?small_bead)
               (when (inventory ?p ?bead1) (on_strip ?strip ?bead1))
